title: DETOX & BALANCE |Spa Resort Mariánské Lázn
description: Discover our offer DETOX & BALANCE and book your stay at Falkensteiner Spa Resort Mariánské Lázn - our wellness hotel ideally located in Marianske Lazne!
cleaned_text: nights The "DETOX & BALANCE" programme has been developed in collaboration with highly qualified and practical nutritional advice, in coordination with the hotel's medical and kitchen management, and takes a 360-degree approach to your health. The success of the programme is based on your full and active participation. "DETOX & BALANCE" supports you in weight regulation with the aim of increasing your physical fitness, learning a sustainable healthy lifestyle and enabling further controlled and sustainable weight loss after departure.
